items.sentence: Tom returned from the kitchen with two mugs of coffee and sat down next to Mary.
Tom served five days in jail last year after pleading guilty to drunken driving.
Tom still works at the same bar that he worked at when he was a college student.
Tom suggested that Mary should resign from her current job and find another one.
Tom usually plays a drum solo at least once every time his band gives a concert.
It took Tom fifteen minutes of googling before he found what he was looking for.
My teacher told me that I should have spent more time preparing my presentation.
The desire to fly in the sky like a bird inspired the invention of the airplane.
Tom always speaks in such a low voice that I can barely understand what he says.
I\'ve had a scratchy throat since this morning. I wonder if I\'ve caught a cold.
